619250.name: Gonio VR
619250.description:
Gonio VR - a physiotherapeutical tool for shoulder injuries

Screening
Extremely precise shoulder movement and 'arc of pain' screening with HTC VIVE tracking.

Rehabilitation exercises
Exciting gamified VR exercises instruct and motivate patients through different shoulder exercises.

Documentation
Save and monitor the progress of each individual patient. Make sure patients receive the most optimal treatment.

Developed with experts
Designed and tested in cooporation with physiotherapists at multiple physiotherapy clinics in Denmark.
619250.supported_languages:
丹麦语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
